Package webcommunication.time

Class TimeAPIClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • webcommunication.time.TimeAPIClient

extends Object
    Class responsible for requesting the server time.

        targetUri - URI of the time API

    • Method Detail

      • getServerTime

        public ZonedDateTime getServerTime()
                            throws TimeRequestException
        Responsible for requesting the the server time of the given spe_ed time API with a HTTP GET request.
        Returns:
        ZonedDateTime of server time
        Throws:
        TimeRequestException - thrown when the communication to the time API is not possible

      • getStartedHttpClient

        private org.eclipse.jetty.client.HttpClient getStartedHttpClient()
                                                          throws TimeRequestException
        Creates a new HttpClient and starts it.
        Returns:
        the started HttpClient
        Throws:
        TimeRequestException - thrown when the time API connection client could not be started

      • getResponseString

        private String getResponseString​(URI uri,
                                 org.eclipse.jetty.client.HttpClient client)
                          throws TimeRequestException
        Sends a new HTTP GET request to the given server and returns the received response as String.
        Parameters:
        uri - URI of the server
        client - the HttpClient to send requests to
        Returns:
        response as String
        Throws:
        TimeRequestException - thrown when the time API could not be reached

      • closeHttpClient

        private void closeHttpClient​(org.eclipse.jetty.client.HttpClient client)
                      throws TimeRequestException
        Closes the given HttpClient.
        Parameters:
        client - HttpClient which has to be closed
        Throws:
        TimeRequestException - thrown when the time API connection client could not be closed
